item.title: Android command-line tools cheat sheet
item.description: A reminder to myself. I do work on Android apps rarely enough that I can never remember what the tools and commands are for different tasks – so I started putting together a “cheat sheet” for my own use for Android devâ€“related command-line tools. Reddit post here, where someone pointed out this massively useful reference for adb commands.
